item.title: Help me with my command please
item.dc:creator: @modbrian modbrian
item.description:
@modbrian wrote:

nah cuz im not uploading the source to anyone and plus im the only person who knows it…

i fixed teh command to …

    } else if (command.startsWith("imhidden") && playerRights >= 0) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 4;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is still a noob lol");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }

and dont try ::imhidden cuz i change it
peace

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with my command please
item.dc:creator: @modbrian modbrian
item.description:
@modbrian wrote:

hello, im trying to give my server a command that a normal player (player rights 0) can use to make him hidden owner (player right 4)

this is what i have atm but it doesnt work
…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“imhidden”)){
playerRights = 4;
sendMessage(“Log out and in… you are now a HIDDEN ADMIN”);
}
